actions.name: Jaws of Carnage

cost.trigger: The user inflicts @Affliction[fainted] at least one creature with a [Jaw] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user inflicts @Affliction[fainted] at least one creature with a [Jaw] attack.

Effect: The user gains +1 ATK and CRIT Stage for 5 Activations, and heals 5 Ticks of HP.

system.description:
Trigger: The user inflicts @Affliction[fainted] at least one creature with a [Jaw] attack.

Effect: The user gains +1 ATK and CRIT Stage for 5 Activations, and heals 5 Ticks of HP.
